ModMetaData.name: Death Stranding Faction: Homo Demens
ModMetaData.author: HIGGS
ModMetaData.description:
This is the first strand-type mod.
Death Stranding Faction: Homo Demens The Homo Demens (Latin: "mad man") are a decentralized group of militant separatists.
01.10.20 - Looking into CE compatibility patch.
Credits: HIGGS - Art and Coding Itzal - Assault Rifle Art Chicken Plucker - Initial Coding Help Discord Members - Coding and Emotional Support Hideo Kojima - Death Stranding
